Html:
Hi,

I was wondering if there is any way to add a split.  By split, I mean what you get in Excel/OpenOffice when you click on the window menu and click split.  I know this is only a display thing, but it does seem to be preserved when you save the file, so when it is opened again, the split is still in place.  I would like to do the same with the files I am generating with phpexcel.
